embeds.title: **⊱ ────── { Test Roles and Achievements**
embeds.description:
If you want to test your knowledge and memory about different webtoons that you've read, you can take a test on them. A tester from our server will contact you through DMs when you request a test and will test you on the webtoon that you chose to be tested on. 
[<#732662492177629325>]

fields.name: > Achievements
fields.value:
There are achievements that you can achieve depending on how many tests you've passed. They are:
__1 test passed__ - **The New Kid**
__3 tests passed__ - **Webnoob**
__5 tests passed__ - **Peasant**
__10 tests passed__ - **Daily Reader**
__15 tests passed__ - **Tester (You can become a tester and test people)**
__20 tests passed__ - **Know-it-all**
__30 tests passed__ - **Webtoon Obsessed**
__40 tests passed__ - **Webtoon Fanatic**
__50 tests passed__ - **Webtoon God**

fields.name: > How to get tested
fields.value: You can apply for a test in<#730531385235734591> if you follow the given instructions. For more information on tests, make sure you check <#732662492177629325>.
